com.stabilit.scm.common.scmp
Class SCMPFault

java.lang.Object
  com.stabilit.scm.common.scmp.SCMPMessage
      com.stabilit.scm.common.scmp.SCMPFault

public class SCMPFault
extends SCMPMessage

The Class SCMPFault. Indicates an error and causes the SCMPHeadlineKey.EXC on the wire protocol.
